text: Unless the purpose is to bankrupt the system earlier, this has no upside imo. Merely sets the stage for more entitlement spending now *and* later.
author: nickgillespie

text: This is ridiculous. Letting people borrow against future SS dollars is a recipe for depletion of funds now and call for more money later. If you want cheaper daycare, increase supply by getting ride of stupid and irrelevant licensing rules...
author: nickgillespie
